allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix: Update Protobuf dependency and add OSAtomic import

- Update Protobuf dependency from 3.4 to 3.27 for better compatibility
- Add libkern/OSAtomic.h import to fix compilation errors
- Add compiler flags to suppress deprecation warnings
- Improve build compatibility with modern Xcode versions

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
